headline: Jim Cramer Says Warren Buffett Owning Occidental Petroleum (OXY) ‘Doesn’t Make it Great’
summary: We recently published a list of 10 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar Amid Market Volatility. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Occidental Petroleum Corp (NYSE:OXY) stands against other stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar amid market volatility. headline: Warren Buffett Has Added to 6 of His 8 Forever Holdings Over the Last 6 Weeks
summary: The Oracle of Omaha plans to hold eight stocks "indefinitely." Recently, he's bought additional shares of six of these companies.
